Author: haveyourspacecowboy
Text: Honestly this is reassuring, I need to calm down. This summer has just kind of been a shitshow living with my parents triggering me and going to the gym constantly and breaking out of that routine will probably be hard at first but I think youâ€™re right all said and done :)

Author: ingefaer_
Text: hey - so i know this might not be exactly what you are asking for, but it might help.  i know a lot of french people/students and they are all quite lean despite eating stupid fatty french food all day long. having lived with a frenchie i also noticed how they do this: food portions are small, with a lot of time in between, and snacking is a very rare occurrence.   i hope that can be some sort of comfort for you, even if its small. the french diet seems so scary, but their way of eating is very focused on enjoying in moderation.
